conversion_verification.notes: Successful isometric cutaway rendering with clear verticality.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent geometry; walls have clear thickness and height. Floor planes and corner geometry are well-defined.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Major layout is faithful. However, there are mirror/orientation inversions in some wing configurations (e.g., ensuite/WIR placement relative to master).

interior_elements.notes: Furniture matches the 2D layout well, including the car in garage and kitchen island placement.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean isometric style. Minimal point deduction for 'RECESS' text artifact appearing as 3D geometry.

detected_errors.description: Spatial inversion of ensuite and walking robe layout compared to original 2D footprint.
Text label 'RECESS' from 2D plan has been baked into the 3D floor geometry.

summary: A high-quality 3D isometric conversion that maintains most of the architectural intent with clear structural integrity, despite minor layout mirroring in sub-sections.
